about_the_game:
DISCOVER THE NEW PIRATE KINGS EXCLUSIVE CAMPAIGN!

Let’s make ‘em pirate kings walk the plank in the Dark Lord’s name!



HOIST THE SAILS AND RECLAIM THE ISLANDS
New original stages and uncanny bosses!

5 new stages: explore all islands and lairs while encountering pesky new enemies.
Prepare cannonballs for the 5 “Pirate Kings”!



Each stage offers 3 different modes: Campaign, Heroic, and Iron.
Pillage the Pirate King’s islands for their hidden treasures!

New enemies: defeat corsairs, buccaneers, bomber parrots and even mischievous monkeys!
And, of course, face electrifying boss fights against all 5 kings, including a familiar face…

TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE WITH THESE MIGHTY NEWCOMERS!



New hero: Lucerna, an Evil Ghost Ship captain with ghostly fading abilities and bombastic firepower.

New tower: the Ogre Shipwreck, a wrecked ship commanded by despicable Warmongers

AND, AS USUAL…

New achievements: because what’s a pirate adventure without its tasty treasures?

Easter eggs galore: it’s never too deep to bring a joke or two to the surface!

General, bring the Dark Lord their flags!
Honor his dark rule by bringing his wrath to these insubordinate Pirates.
The Dark Army counts on you in this new mission!
